The great thing is that the most influential & impactful startups survive any bad market scenario. And they get the remaining resources too.
And yes, the whole public market in the US has been overvalued as I've said.  So you can't say "tech is cheap compared to the whole market."
Which leads $ capital moving into the public market & out of the public market.  And the NASDAQ correlates with private tech valuations.
While some have said "its different this time," out of self interest, humans mimic the same money making behaviors of people around them.
Markets don't go from bull to bear in 1 binary switch. They erode from small cap -> large cap as risk comes out of mkt.See my 9/13/14 tweets
